subject: fix: remove unused exports from state.js and dead import from AppContext
body:
- Remove SECTION_GUIDANCE, getSectionGuidance(), FILTER_DEFAULTS,
  and isMobile() from state.js â€” none were imported after the React
  migration (section guidance is now in React components, filters use
  DEFAULT_FILTERS in AppContext, isMobile is a state variable)
- Remove unused FILTER_DEFAULTS import from AppContext.jsx

title: remove unused exports from state.js and dead import from AppContext
